meanings.definition: A device used for studying biological processes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used the biotrons to observe how cells grow.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician calibrated the biotrons before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The biotrons hummed softly as they analyzed the plant samples.
meanings.sent4: In the world of biology, the biotrons are like detectives uncovering the secrets of life.
meanings.sent5: The biotrons illuminated the intricate dance of living organisms.

meanings.sent1: The biotrons measured the metabolic rate of the cells.
meanings.sent2: Each biotron represents a specific level of biological function.
meanings.sent3: The biotrons in the experiment seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The biotrons buzzed with energy, symbolizing the vitality of the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The biotrons pulsated with the rhythm of life within them.
